summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East John Street, from Bellevue Avenue North to Summit Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2709 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
